content:
One-Click Podcast Summaries to Inbox # I used to listen to long podcasts on YouTube and think:‚ÄúWow‚Ä¶ I should really take notes on this.‚Äù
While doing the dishes. Or walking. Or in the car. Spoiler: I never took the notes. So I built a tool for myself. It‚Äôs just a form:
‚Üí I drop in the YouTube link
‚Üí Add my email
‚Üí Hit submit Behind the scenes, it:
‚Äì Scrapes the transcript (via Apify)
‚Äì Summarizes the main points, stories, and lessons (OpenAI)
‚Äì Sends me an email
‚Äì And also saves it to Notion so I can refer back later I use it way more than I expected. It‚Äôs not fancy. It doesn‚Äôt have a name.
But it helps me learn from content I would‚Äôve otherwise let wash over me. And now when I hear something good in a 2-hour podcast, I don‚Äôt just think ‚ÄúI should remember this someday.‚Äù
I just send the link‚Äîand move on.
Now instead of forgetting, I just get a neat little summary in my inbox. And for once, it‚Äôs an unread email I actually want to open.
